# Installing Linux libraries

Get inspiration from: https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/package-management-basics-apt-yum-dnf-pkg


| Operating System | Format | Tool(s) |
| Debian / Ubuntu / Linux Mint / Raspbian | .deb | apt, apt-cache, apt-get, dpkg |
| CentOS (RedHat) | .rpm | yum |
| Fedora (RedHat) | .rpm | dnf |
| FreeBSD | .txz | make, pkg |
